publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2215 Bill Aitken: The Sheriff Court Fees Amendment Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Sheriff Court Fees Amendment Order 2008 (SSI 2008/239).
S3M-2215 Bill Aitken: The Sheriff Court Fees Amendment Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Sheriff Court Fees Amendment Order 2008 (SSI 2008/239).
S3M-2215 The Sheriff Court Fees Amendment Order 2008 (lodged on 18 June 2008) Bill Butler*
